name: Dimensions (Magmi)
description:
Travel through the dimensions and get equipment to defeat the giant slime!

Unfortunately, the game is still only in german available, but i will fix that in future versions

Controls

Moving: W, A, S, D (pretty obvious, right?)
Inventory: E
Drop Item: Q
Using main hand item: Left Mouse Button
Using off hand item: Right Mouse Button
Exit: Escape
